scripts.dev: npm run development && npm run development -- --env.mixfile=webpack.blocks.mix.js
scripts.build: npm run rmdist && npm run rmbuild && npm run production && npm run production -- --env.mixfile=webpack.build.mix.js && rimraf build/*/resources/blocks/*/*.scss && rimraf build/*/resources/blocks/*/*.js
scripts.pot: mkdir -p ./resources/lang && find ./resources ./src -iname '*.php' | xargs xgettext --add-comments=TRANSLATORS --force-po --from-code=UTF-8 --default-domain=en_US -k__ -k_e -k_n:1,2 -k_x:1,2c -k_ex:1,2c -k_nx:4c,12 -kesc_attr__ -kesc_attr_e -kesc_attr_x:1,2c -kesc_html__ -kesc_html_e -kesc_html_x:1,2c -k_n_noop:1,2 -k_nx_noop:3c,1,2, -k__ngettext_noop:1,2 -o resources/lang/astratic-blocks.pot && find ./resources -iname '*.blade.php' | xargs xgettext --language=Python --add-comments=TRANSLATORS --force-po --from-code=UTF-8 --default-domain=en_US -k__ -k_e -k_n:1,2 -k_x:1,2c -k_ex:1,2c -k_nx:4c,12 -kesc_attr__ -kesc_attr_e -kesc_attr_x:1,2c -kesc_html__ -kesc_html_e -kesc_html_x:1,2c -k_n_noop:1,2 -k_nx_noop:3c,1,2, -k__ngettext_noop:1,2 -j -o resources/lang/astratic-blocks.pot
scripts.db:export: mysqldump -uroot -proot -h127.0.0.1 --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --column-statistics=0 --no-tablespaces indeon_plugin > db.sql && gzip db.sql && mv db.sql.gz ../../../db.sql.gz
scripts.db:export:staging: npm run srp:local:staging && npm run db:export && npm run srp:staging:local
scripts.db:export:prod: npm run srp:local:prod && npm run db:export && npm run srp:prod:local
scripts.srp:staging:local: wp search-replace plugin.staging plugin.test --all-tables --path=../../../ && wp search-replace https://plugin.test http://plugin.test --all-tables --path=../../../ && wp plugin deactivate autoptimize cache-enabler wp-mail-smtp --path=../../../
scripts.srp:prod:local: wp search-replace plugin.prod plugin.test --all-tables --path=../../../ && wp search-replace https://plugin.test http://plugin.test --all-tables --path=../../../ && wp plugin deactivate autoptimize cache-enabler wp-mail-smtp --path=../../../
scripts.srp:local:staging: wp search-replace plugin.test plugin.staging --all-tables --path=../../../ && wp search-replace http://plugin.staging https://plugin.staging --all-tables --path=../../../
scripts.srp:local:prod: wp search-replace plugin.test plugin.prod --all-tables --path=../../../ && wp search-replace http://plugin.prod https://plugin.prod --all-tables --path=../../../
